Title: Is Craigslist the Last Real Place on the Internet?
Description:
Millennials are still using Craigslist to find jobs, find love, and even to cast creative projects—eschewing other AI- and algorithm-dominated online spaces.
“There’s a purity to it.”

Title: A Supreme Court ruling could bring historic drop in Black representation in Congress
Description: If the Supreme Court weakens Voting Rights Act protections against racial discrimination in redistricting, it could usher in the largest-ever drop in representation by Black members of Congress.

Title: This is the key breakthrough AI still requires to reach superintelligence, according to those building it

Title: Ford is revving up its self-driving ambitions and making key tech in-house
Description:

The legacy automaker is making the tech in-house to get there.

Title: A new study casts doubt on life beneath Europa’s ice
Description:
Europa’s buried ocean has made it one of the most exciting places to search for life beyond Earth.
However, new calculations suggest its seafloor may be calm, cold, and largely inactive, with little energy to support living organisms.
